goal: Add a CParty API to compute the fixed-structure energy E(G果', S) and enable exact logP(G'|G,S).

user_stories.story: Investigate CParty internals to locate or derive fixed-structure energy evaluation for a given sequence and dot-bracket structure (G果'). Document the chosen approach.
Implement internal function to compute E(G果', S) (kcal/mol) for a fixed dot-bracket structure, reusing existing energy routines where possible.
Expose public API in CPartyAPI: get_structure_energy(seq, db_full) returning E(G果',S) or NaN on invalid input.
Add tests for the fixed-structure energy API (finite output, deterministic, invalid inputs return NaN).
